consent.title: Data Privacy Consent
consent.description: We value your privacy and are committed to protecting your data in accordance with the Digital Personal Data Protection (DPDP) Act, 2023.
consent.message: By using this platform, you consent to the collection and processing of your research data for the purpose of providing AI-powered research support services. Your data will be stored securely and will not be shared with third parties without your explicit consent.
consent.required: Consent is required to use this platform
